attributes.action: To update the UK restrictions on Coronavirus by abolishing the exercise rule.
attributes.additional_details: Individuals around the UK are taking advantage of this newly implemented exercise rule. People are still using public parks in groups. This exercise restriction is not strict enough and people all over England are still going out and using this rule as an excuse to be outside.
attributes.background: Abolish the exercise restriction & implement a more strict lockdown like other countries around the world have easily done.
